founder.title: About
founder.name: Ms. Sara Al-Qassas
founder.subtitle: Quran and Qira'at Teacher
founder.description: Highly specialized in correcting Quran recitation and teaching the ten Qira'at (from Shatibiyyah and Durrah methods).

hifz.title: Memorization
items: Memorized the entire Quran with Tajweed at age seven.
Recited the entire Quran in one sitting multiple times.

tajweed.title: Tajweed
items: Mastered Quran Tajweed in pronunciation and study, certified in: Jazariyyah and Tuhfat Al-Atfal.
Studied 'Al-Mufassal fi Al-Tajweed' (one of the main books in the field, taught by her mother Professor Azza Abdel Rahim Suleiman).
Studied 'Tasheel Al-Shatibiyyah' (one of the main books explaining Shatibiyyah, taught by her mother Professor Azza Abdel Rahim Suleiman).
Conducted several courses in teaching Tajweed for children and adults.

qiraat.title: Qira'at
items: Mastered the ten Qira'at from Shatibiyyah and Durrah methods at age fourteen.
Certified several teachers in one or more Qira'at.

activities.title: Teacher's Activities
items: Correcting recitation and explaining Tajweed, and giving certification.
Explaining Shatibiyyah principles and giving certification.
Teaching the ten Qira'at from Shatibiyyah and Durrah methods.
